Package Controllers

Class add_customer_controller

java.lang.Object
Controllers.add_customer_controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class add_customer_controller extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is the controller for the add_customer FXML Page of the Application, also providing definitions for member methods.
